channel.title: Is It Safe?
channel.description:
Well when I see people giving away their scar scripts they made, I usually see in the picture it asks for your Username and Password. I'm kinda afraid that it would be hacked...So is it safe or not?
~Mike

item.title: Is It Safe?
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

They are all safe. don’t worry about it. Ive only seen it done once in all the time scar has been out. It has never even occured to me that it will happen because I always see all the positive feedback by other epople about the script.

Read full topic

item.title: Is It Safe?
item.dc:creator: @MoparRocksScape MoparRocksScape
item.description:
@MoparRocksScape wrote:

Okay guys thanks…But still, it may be too late for people who have used the Scar Scripts keyloggers in it.

~Mike

Read full topic

item.title: Is It Safe?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

I wonder why he did it.

I was just saying that…

but to play it safe, just don’t use scripts that access websites, but it is REALLY unlkely you will get your pass stolen.

Read full topic

item.title: Is It Safe?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Bobby:

no, boberts wasn’t safe…if you don’t know code, if they access a website, don’t use them .

It was removed and he was banned.

Read full topic

no, boberts wasn’t safe…if you don’t know code, if they access a website, don’t use them .

item.title: Is It Safe?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“MoparRocksScape, post:1, topic:87697”]Well when I see people giving away their scar scripts they made, I usually see in the picture it asks for your Username and Password. I’m kinda afraid that it would be hacked…So is it safe or not?

~Mike[/quote]

Scripts are open source, if you don’t trust it, look through the code. Encrypted ones are guaranteed safe.

I’d say 100% of all scripts posted here are safe.

Read full topic
